speaker: Heartwood
lines: The market closes and the clearing is quiet.
You set the twig bundle on the stump used as a scale.
A gloved hand offers you a reward for the trade.
Roots shift under your boots and settle again.
The air smells of sap and cut wood.
You steady your breathing and take what is offered.
You turn toward the trail ready to leave the grove.
You receive something that fits your grip.

give_item.name: Thornbow
give_item.description: A bow grown, not carved; it remembers which way to bend

give_item.name: Heart-Root Blade
give_item.description: A blade with grain; it favors the patient

give_item.name: Verdant Word
give_item.description: Speak and the green leans to listen
